answers.answer: The primary purpose of the PTSD Help app is to serve as a free assistant for managing Post Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD).
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The PTSD Help app provides essential information about PTSD, a self-assessment module, practical tools for managing discomfort, crisis support contacts, and detailed information about professional treatments.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the section under 'What does PTSD Help do?'.

answers.answer: PTSD Help assists users with managing discomfort by providing practical tools specifically designed for this purpose.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the section under 'What does PTSD Help do?'.

answers.answer: The PTSD Help app was developed in partnership with the US Department of Veterans Affairs - National Center for PTSD.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The PTSD Help app is available on Android and iOS platforms.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The PTSD Help app is designed to help vulnerable people affected by the crisis in Ukraine, including refugees and those still in Ukraine, as well as anyone in vulnerable situations affected by traumatic experiences.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: PTSD Help addresses crisis situations by providing crisis support contacts within the app.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the section under 'What does PTSD Help do?'.

answers.answer: The PTSD Help app includes detailed information about available professional treatments.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopopoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the section under 'What does PTSD Help do?'.

answers.answer: The PTSD Help app can help someone understand their symptoms through its self-assessment module.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the section under 'What does PTSD Help do?'.
